H0.text: when does synapsis of homologous chromosomes occur in mitosis. Prophase of mitosis

H1.text: when does synapsis of homologous chromosomes occur in mitosis. Interphase of mitosis

H2.text: when does synapsis of homologous chromosomes occur in mitosis. Metaphase of mitosis

H3.text: when does synapsis of homologous chromosomes occur in mitosis. prophase I of meiosis

A4.text: Synapsis takes place during prophase I of meiosis.

A5.text: Mitosis also has prophase, but does not ordinarily do pairing of two homologous chromosomes.
